name: QSS Toolbox
short_description:
The QSS Toolbox models the energy flow in conventional, hybrid and electric vehicles in order to find the fuel consumption. It follows the backwards simulation approach, which is called quasi-stationary simulation. This means component loads are derived step by step from the drive cycle. 

This is a fork of the QSS Toolbox Version 2.0.1 as published by the ETH Zürich (http://www.idsc.ethz.ch/Downloads/DownloadFiles/qss). The goal of this fork is to make it more flexible, thus allowing the modelling of more complex vehicle architectures. Users, testers and contributors are very welcome.
summary: MATLAB Toolbox for Quasi-Stationary Modelling of Hybrid Vehicles
